title: windows 10 problems
body: it makes today 2 days since i have updated to windows 10 and on that day i hasn,t availible to launch the game it says Pve kernel stoped and i cant launch the game someone can help ?

replies.body: I ran my game as administrator and it worked

Right click your League of Legends shortcut, click properties, click on the compatibility tab. From there you can either click 'Run compatibility troubleshooter'. Or just put a check mark in the box that says 'Run this program in compatibility mode for:' and then select Windows 7 in the drop down box.

Just updated to Windows 10 myself. Got the same error.

Hope this helps!

You're getting a kernel error when you're attempting to patch, correct?  If so, this is usually a permissions thing which seems likely since you just changed operating systems.  Go ahead and check out our article on [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for more info on how to set up your permissions.  Let me know if it helps!
